short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boosts your twitch experience to the next level by providing you with a lot of useful features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch Tools provides you with a on-page statistic system. Giving you all the information you need to select a streamer that meets your expectations in entertainment and community quality! Further more Twitch Tools gives you access to log into Twitch Tokens via the extension panel, a to this date unheard of feature for any extension! And as the cherry on top, if you need more statistics about a certain streamer, Twitch Tools gives you access to a easy to use user query, to get the last bit of information about a streamer. All in all Twitch Tools is the most comprehensive twitch-focused extension out there and its free!
